dict.string: The fast fourier transform is an algorithm for efficiently calculating the discrete fourier transform. Converting a signal from the time domain to the frequency domain. It is often used to analyse complex signals like audio, which are made from a sum of different sine waves.
Frequency is the number of occurrences of a repeating event per unit, often measured in Hertz. In this playground frequency refers to a periodic vibration of air, audible to the human ear.
Meassurement of the energy carried by a sound wave.
